verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> also came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> thou<WH859> dwellest<WH3427> in the midst<WH8432> of a rebellious<WH4805> house,<WH1004> which<WH834> have eyes<WH5869> to see,<WH7200> and see<WH7200> not;<WH3808> they have ears<WH241> to hear,<WH8085> and hear<WH8085> not:<WH3808> for<WH3588> they<WH1992> are a rebellious<WH4805> house.<WH1004>

Therefore, thou<WH859> son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> prepare<WH6213> thee stuff<WH3627> for removing,<WH1473> and remove<WH1540> by day<WH3119> in their sight;<WH5869> and thou shalt remove<WH1540> from thy place<WH4480> <WH4725> to<WH413> another<WH312> place<WH4725> in their sight:<WH5869> it may be<WH194> they will consider,<WH7200> though<WH3588> they<WH1992> be a rebellious<WH4805> house.<WH1004>

Then shalt thou bring forth<WH3318> thy stuff<WH3627> by day<WH3119> in their sight,<WH5869> as stuff<WH3627> for removing:<WH1473> and thou<WH859> shalt go forth<WH3318> at even<WH6153> in their sight,<WH5869> as they that go forth<WH4161> into captivity.<WH1473>
Dig <WH2864> thou through the wall<WH7023> in their sight,<WH5869> and carry out<WH3318> thereby.

In their sight<WH5869> shalt thou bear<WH5375> it upon<WH5921> thy shoulders,<WH3802> and carry it forth<WH3318> in the twilight:<WH5939> thou shalt cover<WH3680> thy face,<WH6440> that thou see<WH7200> not<WH3808> <WH853> the ground:<WH776> for<WH3588> I have set<WH5414> thee for a sign<WH4159> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>

And I did<WH6213> so<WH3651> as<WH834> I was commanded:<WH6680> I brought forth<WH3318> my stuff<WH3627> by day,<WH3119> as stuff<WH3627> for captivity,<WH1473> and in the even<WH6153> I digged<WH2864> through the wall<WH7023> with mine hand;<WH3027> I brought it forth<WH3318> in the twilight,<WH5939> and I bore<WH5375> it upon<WH5921> my shoulder<WH3802> in their sight.<WH5869>
And in the morning<WH1242> came<WH1961> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>
Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> hath not<WH3808> the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> the rebellious<WH4805> house,<WH1004> said<WH559> unto<WH413> thee, What<WH4100> doest<WH6213> thou?<WH859>

Say <WH559> thou unto<WH413> them, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> This<WH2088> burden<WH4853> concerneth the prince<WH5387> in Jerusalem,<WH3389> and all<WH3605> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> that<WH834> are among<WH8432> them.
Say, <WH559> I<WH589> am your sign:<WH4159> like as<WH834> I have done,<WH6213> so<WH3651> shall it be done<WH6213> unto them: they shall remove<WH1473> and go<WH1980> into captivity.<WH7628>

And the prince<WH5387> that<WH834> is among<WH8432> them shall bear<WH5375> upon<WH413> his shoulder<WH3802> in the twilight,<WH5939> and shall go forth:<WH3318> they shall dig<WH2864> through the wall<WH7023> to carry out<WH3318> thereby: he shall cover<WH3680> his face,<WH6440> that<WH3282> <WH834> he<WH1931> see<WH7200> not<WH3808> <WH853> the ground<WH776> with his eyes.<WH5869>

<WH853> My net<WH7568> also will I spread<WH6566> upon<WH5921> him, and he shall be taken<WH8610> in my snare:<WH4686> and I will bring<WH935> him to Babylon<WH894> to the land<WH776> of the Chaldeans;<WH3778> yet shall he not<WH3808> see<WH7200> it, though he shall die<WH4191> there.<WH8033>

And I will scatter<WH2219> toward every<WH3605> wind<WH7307> all<WH3605> that<WH834> are about<WH5439> him to help<WH5828> him, and all<WH3605> his bands;<WH102> and I will draw out<WH7324> the sword<WH2719> after<WH310> them.
And they shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD,<WH3068> when I shall scatter<WH6327> them among the nations,<WH1471> and disperse<WH2219> them in the countries.<WH776>

But I will leave<WH3498> a few<WH4557> men<WH376> of<WH4480> them from the sword,<WH4480> <WH2719> from the famine,<WH4480> <WH7458> and from the pestilence;<WH4480> <WH1698> that<WH4616> they may declare<WH5608> <WH853> all<WH3605> their abominations<WH8441> among the heathen<WH1471> whither<WH834> <WH8033> they come;<WH935> and they shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>
Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>
Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> eat<WH398> thy bread<WH3899> with quaking,<WH7494> and drink<WH8354> thy water<WH4325> with trembling<WH7269> and with carefulness;<WH1674>

And say<WH559> unto<WH413> the people<WH5971> of the land,<WH776> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and of<WH413> the land<WH127> of Israel;<WH3478> They shall eat<WH398> their bread<WH3899> with carefulness,<WH1674> and drink<WH8354> their water<WH4325> with astonishment,<WH8078> that<WH4616> her land<WH776> may be desolate<WH3456> from all that is therein,<WH4480> <WH4393> because of the violence<WH4480> <WH2555> of all<WH3605> them that dwell<WH3427> therein.

And the cities<WH5892> that are inhabited<WH3427> shall be laid waste,<WH2717> and the land<WH776> shall be<WH1961> desolate;<WH8077> and ye shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>
And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> what<WH4100> is that<WH2088> proverb<WH4912> that ye have in<WH5921> the land<WH127> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> The days<WH3117> are prolonged,<WH748> and every<WH3605> vision<WH2377> faileth?<WH6>

Tell <WH559> <WH413> them therefore,<WH3651> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> I will make this<WH2088> proverb<WH4912> <WH853> to cease,<WH7673> and they shall no<WH3808> more<WH5750> use it as a proverb<WH4911> <WH853> in Israel;<WH3478> but<WH3588> <WH518> say<WH1696> unto<WH413> them, The days<WH3117> are at hand,<WH7126> and the effect<WH1697> of every<WH3605> vision.<WH2377>
For <WH3588> there shall be<WH1961> no<WH3808> more<WH5750> any<WH3605> vain<WH7723> vision<WH2377> nor flattering<WH2509> divination<WH4738> within<WH8432> the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478>

For <WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD:<WH3068> I will speak,<WH1696> and the word<WH1697> <WH853> that<WH834> I shall speak<WH1696> shall come to pass;<WH6213> it shall be no<WH3808> more<WH5750> prolonged:<WH4900> for<WH3588> in your days,<WH3117> O rebellious<WH4805> house,<WH1004> will I say<WH1696> the word,<WH1697> and will perform<WH6213> it, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
Again the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> behold,<WH2009> they of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> say,<WH559> The vision<WH2377> that<WH834> he<WH1931> seeth<WH2372> is for many<WH7227> days<WH3117> to come, and he<WH1931> prophesieth<WH5012> of the times<WH6256> that are far off.<WH7350>

Therefore <WH3651> say<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> There shall none<WH3808> <WH3605> of my words<WH1697> be prolonged<WH4900> any more,<WH5750> but the word<WH1697> which<WH834> I have spoken<WH1696> shall be done,<WH6213> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
